wikitext.*:
'''Joseph Pearce''' (born [[12 February]] [[1961]]) is currently co-editor of the [http://staustinreview.org/ St. Austin Review] journal and other magazines.<ref>{{webcite|articleurl=http://jpearce.co/about/|articlename=Personal profile|website=[http://jpearce.co/ Personal web]|accessed=4 May 2019}}</ref> He is also former Writer-in-Residence and Professor of Literature at [[Wikipedia:Thomas More College of Liberal Arts|Thomas More College of Liberal Arts]],<ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=http://thomasmorecollege.edu/faculty-staff/joseph-pearce/|articlename=Joseph Pearce Profile|website=[http://www.thomasmorecollege.edu/ Thomas More College of Liberal Arts]|accessed=4 May 2019}}</ref>
